TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RegistrySecurity extends System.Security.AccessControl.NativeObjectSecurity
Public NotInheritable Class RegistrySecurity Inherits NativeObjectSecurity

summary.span: 表示注册表项的 Windows 访问控制安全性。

span.span: Represents the Windows access control security for a registry key.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象指定注册表项的访问权限以及如何审核访问尝试。A object specifies access rights for a registry key, and also specifies how access attempts are audited. 注册表项的访问权限表示为规则，由表示每个访问规则对象。Access rights to the registry key are expressed as rules, with each access rule represented by a object. 每个审核规则由对象。Each auditing rule is represented by a object. 这反映了基础的 Windows 安全系统，其中每个安全对象具有最多有一个自定义访问控制列表 (DACL) 控制对受保护的对象，并最多指定的访问权限的一个系统访问控制列表 (SACL) 访问尝试进行审核。This mirrors the underlying Windows security system, in which each securable object has at most one discretionary access control list (DACL) that controls access to the secured object, and at most one system access control list (SACL) that specifies which access attempts are audited. DACL 和 SACL 进行排序的访问控制项 (ACE) 指定的访问和审核用户和组的列表。The DACL and SACL are ordered lists of access control entries (ACE) that specify access and auditing for users and groups. 一个或对象可以表示多个 ACE。A or object might represent more than one ACE. > [!NOTE] > Windows 访问控制安全性只能应用到注册表项。Windows access control security can only be applied to registry keys. 它不能应用于单个键/值对存储在的密钥。It cannot be applied to individual key/value pairs stored in a key. ， ，和类隐藏的 Acl 和 Ace 的实现详细信息。The , , and classes hide the implementation details of ACLs and ACEs. 它们允许您忽略十七个不同的 ACE 类型和继承和传播的访问权限进行正确维护的复杂性。They allow you to ignore the seventeen different ACE types and the complexity of correctly maintaining inheritance and propagation of access rights. 这些对象还旨在阻止以下常见的访问控制错误：These objects are also designed to prevent the following common access control errors: - 创建具有 null DACL 的安全描述符。Creating a security descriptor with a null DACL. 对 DACL 的 null 引用允许任何用户将访问规则添加到一个对象，可能会创建拒绝服务攻击。A null reference to a DACL allows any user to add access rules to an object, potentially creating a denial-of-service attack. 一个新对象开始时始终使用空的 DACL，此操作会拒绝所有用户的所有访问权限。A new object always starts with an empty DACL, which denies all access for all users. - 违反 Ace 的规范顺序。Violating the canonical ordering of ACEs. 如果 DACL 中的 ACE 列表不会保存在规范顺序，用户可能会无意中被赋予访问受保护的对象。If the ACE list in the DACL is not kept in the canonical order, users might inadvertently be given access to the secured object. 例如，被拒绝的访问权限必须始终出现在允许的访问权限之前。For example, denied access rights must always appear before allowed access rights. 对象在内部维护正确的顺序。 objects maintain the correct order internally. - 操作应仅资源管理器控制下的安全描述符标志。Manipulating security descriptor flags, which should be under resource manager control only. - 正在创建无效的 ACE 标志组合。Creating invalid combinations of ACE flags. - 处理继承的 Ace。Manipulating inherited ACEs. 继承和传播由资源管理器，以响应对访问和审核规则所做的更改处理。Inheritance and propagation are handled by the resource manager, in response to changes you make to access and audit rules. - 将无意义的 Ace 插入到 Acl。Inserting meaningless ACEs into ACLs. 不支持的.NET 安全对象的唯一功能是危险的活动，应避免使用由大多数应用程序开发人员，如下所示：The only capabilities not supported by the .NET security objects are dangerous activities that should be avoided by the majority of application developers, such as the following: - 通常由资源管理器执行的低级别任务。Low-level tasks that are normally performed by the resource manager. - 添加或删除访问控制项中不维护规范排序的方式。Adding or removing access control entries in ways that do not maintain the canonical ordering. 若要修改 Windows 注册表项的访问控制安全性，请使用方法以获取对象。To modify Windows access control security for a registry key, use the method to get the object. 通过添加和删除规则，修改安全对象，然后使用方法以将其重新附加。Modify the security object by adding and removing rules, and then use the method to reattach it. > [!IMPORTANT] > 对所做的更改对象并不会影响注册表项的访问级别，直到你调用方法以将修改过的安全对象分配到注册表项。Changes you make to a object do not affect the access levels of the registry key until you call the method to assign the altered security object to the registry key. 若要将访问控制安全性复制到另一个注册表项，请使用方法以获取表示第一个注册表项的访问和审核规则的对象，然后使用方法来分配到这些规则第二个注册表项。To copy access control security from one registry key to another, use the method to get a object representing the access and audit rules for the first registry key, and then use the method to assign those rules to the second registry key. 此外可以将规则分配到与第二个注册表项或采用方法对象参数。You can also assign the rules to a second registry key with an or method that takes a object parameter. 安全描述符定义语言 (SDDL) 投资的用户可以使用方法以设置注册表项的访问规则和方法来获取一个字符串，表示访问规则的 SDDL 格式。Users with an investment in the security descriptor definition language (SDDL) can use the method to set access rules for a registry key, and the method to obtain a string that represents the access rules in SDDL format. 这不被建议用于新开发。This is not recommended for new development. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个示例显示了如何兼容规则合并时添加和删除，且第二个显示继承和传播标志的添加和删除的规则的影响。The first example shows how compatible rules merge when added and removed, and the second shows how inheritance and propagation flags affect the addition and deletion of rules. 示例 1Example 1 下面的代码示例演示如何方法从兼容规则，将删除权限和如何方法将使用兼容的规则的权限合并。The following code example shows how the method removes rights from a compatible rule, and how the method merges rights with compatible rules. 此示例将创建对象并将添加一个规则： 允许当前用户权限。The example creates a object and adds a rule that allows the current user rights. 然后，示例创建一个规则，授予用户、 具有相同的继承和传播权限作为第一个规则，并使用方法中删除此新规则与对象。The example then creates a rule that grants the user , with the same inheritance and propagation rights as the first rule, and uses the method to remove this new rule from the object. 是的构成，因此它从兼容规则中删除。 is a constituent of , so it is removed from the compatible rule. 中的规则对象，分别显示剩余组成部分。The rules in the object are displayed, showing the remaining constituents of . 然后，示例代码调用方法来合并回中的规则右键对象。The example code then calls the method to merge the right back into the rule in the object. > [!NOTE] > 此示例不会附加到的安全对象对象。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 本部分中的第二个示例将附加的安全对象，也是如此示例和。The second example in this section attaches a security object, and so do the examples in and . [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)] 示例 2Example 2 下面的代码示例演示如何使用继承和传播访问规则。The following code example demonstrates access rules with inheritance and propagation. 此示例将创建对象，然后创建并添加了具有两个规则标志。The example creates a object, then creates and adds two rules that have the flag. 第一条规则有任何传播标志，而第二个和。The first rule has no propagation flags, while the second has and . 该程序显示中的规则对象，然后使用对象来创建一个子项。The program displays the rules in the object, and then uses the object to create a subkey. 该程序创建子项和孙级子项，则将显示每个子项的安全性。The program creates a child subkey and a grandchild subkey, then displays the security for each subkey. 最后，程序会删除测试密钥。Finally, the program deletes the test keys. [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个新对象开始时始终具有空的自由访问控制列表 (DACL)，此操作会拒绝所有用户的所有访问权限。A new object always starts with an empty discretionary access list (DACL), which denies all access for all users.

summary.span: 获取 类用于表示访问权限的枚举类型。

span.span: Gets the enumeration type that the class uses to represent access rights.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示 枚举。

span.span: A object representing the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的类类重写属性，并返回它们用于表示访问权限的类型。Classes that derive from the class override the property and return the type they use to represent access rights. 数组或包含多个类型的安全对象的集合时，使用此属性来确定要使用每个安全对象的正确的枚举类型。When you work with arrays or collections that contain multiple types of security objects, use this property to determine the correct enumeration type to use with each security object.

summary.span: 使用指定的访问权限、访问控制和标志为指定用户创建新的访问控制规则。

span.span: Creates a new access control rule for the specified user, with the specified access rights, access control, and flags.

returns.span: 一个 对象，表示指定用户的指定权限。

span.span: A object representing the specified rights for the specified user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建访问控制规则的建议的方法是使用的构造函数类。The recommended way to create access control rules is to use the constructors of the class. > [!NOTE] > 虽然可以指定标志，则没有必要这样做。Although you can specify the flag, there is no point in doing so. 用于访问控制的目的，在一个子项的名称/值对不是单独的对象。For the purposes of access control, the name/value pairs in a subkey are not separate objects. 名称/值对的访问权限会受该子项的权限。The access rights to name/value pairs are controlled by the rights of the subkey. 此外，由于所有子项的容器 （即，它们可以包含其他子项），它们不受标志。Furthermore, since all subkeys are containers (that is, they can contain other subkeys), they are not affected by the flag. 最后，指定标志不必要地复杂化维护的规则，因为它会影响正常兼容规则组合起来。Finally, specifying the flag needlessly complicates the maintenance of rules, because it interferes with the normal combination of compatible rules.

exception.span: 、、 或 指定了一个无效值。

span.span: , , , or specifies an invalid value.
is .
-or- is zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的类类重写属性，并返回它们用于表示访问规则的类型。Classes that derive from the class override the property and return the type they use to represent access rules. 数组或包含多个类型的安全对象的集合时，使用此属性来确定要使用每个安全对象的正确的访问规则类型。When you work with arrays or collections that contain multiple types of security objects, use this property to determine the correct access rule type to use with each security object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddAccessRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 要添加的访问控制规则。

span.span: The access control rule to add.

summary.span: 搜索匹配的访问控制，新规则将与之进行合并。

span.span: Searches for a matching access control with which the new rule can be merged.

summary.span: 如果未找到符合条件的规则，则添加新规则。

span.span: If none are found, adds the new rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法搜索与同一用户或组和相同的规则作为`rule`。The method searches for rules with the same user or group and the same as `rule`. 如果找不到，`rule`添加。If none are found, `rule` is added. 如果找到匹配规则是中的权限`rule`与现有规则合并。If a matching rule is found, the rights in `rule` are merged with the existing rule. 无法合并规则，如果它们具有不同的继承标志。Rules cannot be merged if they have different inheritance flags. 例如，如果用户允许读访问，没有继承标志，并用于添加一个规则，授予用户写访问，子项的继承 ()，不能合并两个规则。For example, if a user is allowed read access with no inheritance flags, and is used to add a rule giving the user write access with inheritance for subkeys (), the two rules cannot be merged. 具有不同的规则值将永远不会合并。Rules with different values are never merged. 规则 express 最经济的方法中的权限。Rules express rights in the most economical way. 例如，如果用户具有，并，并且您将添加规则，以允许权限，用户拥有的所有组成部分权限。For example, if a user has , and rights, and you add a rule allowing rights, the user has all the constituent parts of rights. 如果您查询用户的权限，你将看到一个规则，其中包含权限。If you query the user's rights, you will see a rule containing rights. 同样，如果删除权限的其他成员权限将重新出现。Similarly, if you remove rights, the other constituents of rights will reappear. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建注册表访问规则，并将它们添加到合并对象，其中显示如何允许和拒绝权限的规则都保持独立，而兼容的相同规则类型。The following code example creates registry access rules and adds them to a object, showing how rules that allow and deny rights remain separate, while compatible rules of the same kind are merged. > [!NOTE] > 此示例不会附加到的安全对象对象。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 附加安全对象的示例可在和。Examples that attach security objects can be found in and . 可以在中找到的代码示例演示了继承和传播标志类。A code example that demonstrates inheritance and propagation flags can be found in the class. [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.AddAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.AddAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)]

param.name: rule

span.span: The audit rule to add.

param.span: 由此规则指定的用户来确定搜索。

span.span: The user specified by this rule determines the search.

summary.span: 搜索可以将新规则与之合并的审核规则。

span.span: Searches for an audit rule with which the new rule can be merged.

summary.span: 如果未找到符合条件的规则，则添加新规则。

span.span: If none are found, adds the new rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法搜索的规则具有相同的用户或组作为`rule`。The method searches for rules with the same user or group as `rule`. 如果找不到，`rule`添加。If none are found, `rule` is added. 如果找到匹配规则是中的标志`rule`合并到现有规则。If a matching rule is found, the flags in `rule` are merged into the existing rule. 无法合并规则，如果它们具有不同的继承标志。Rules cannot be merged if they have different inheritance flags. 例如，为特定用户，没有任何继承标志，审核如果尝试写入注册表项失败和用于添加一个规则，指定是否要为同一用户，但具有一个继承的审核更改权限的尝试失败子项 ()，不能合并两个规则。For example, if failed attempts to write to a key are audited for a particular user, with no inheritance flags, and is used to add a rule specifying that failed attempts to change permissions are to be audited for the same user, but with inheritance for subkeys (), the two rules cannot be merged.

summary.span: 新建审核规则，指定此规则应用到的用户、要审核的访问权限、规则的继承和传播以及触发此规则的结果。

span.span: Creates a new audit rule, specifying the user the rule applies to, the access rights to audit, the inheritance and propagation of the rule, and the outcome that triggers the rule.

returns.span: 一个 对象，表示指定用户的指定审核规则，带有指定标志。

span.span: A object representing the specified audit rule for the specified user, with the specified flags.

returns.span: 该方法的返回类型是基类 ，但可以安全地将返回值强制转换为派生类。

span.span: The return type of the method is the base class, , but the return value can be cast safely to the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建的审核规则的建议的方法是使用的构造函数类。The recommended way to create audit rules is to use the constructors of the class. > [!NOTE] > 虽然可以指定标志，则没有必要这样做。Although you can specify the flag, there is no point in doing so. 出于审核控制，在一个子项的名称/值对不是单独的对象。For the purposes of audit control, the name/value pairs in a subkey are not separate objects. 名称/值对的审核权限由该子项的权限控制。The audit rights to name/value pairs are controlled by the rights of the subkey. 此外，由于所有子项的容器 （即，它们可以包含其他子项），它们不受标志。Furthermore, since all subkeys are containers (that is, they can contain other subkeys), they are not affected by the flag. 最后，指定标志不必要地复杂化维护的规则，因为它会影响正常兼容规则组合起来。Finally, specifying the flag needlessly complicates the maintenance of rules, because it interferes with the normal combination of compatible rules.

exception.span: 、、 或 指定了一个无效值。

span.span: , , , or specifies an invalid value.
is .
-or- is zero.

exception.span: 既不属于类型 ，也不属于可以转换为 类型的类型（如 ）。

span.span: is neither of type , nor of a type such as that can be converted to type .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property AuditRuleType As Type
public: virtual property Type ^ AuditRuleType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 类用于表示审核规则的类型。

span.span: Gets the type that the class uses to represent audit rules.

value.span: 一个表示 类的 对象。

span.span: A object representing the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的类类重写属性，并返回它们用于表示审核权限的类型。Classes that derive from the class override the property and return the type they use to represent audit rights. 数组或包含多个类型的安全对象的集合时，使用此属性来确定要使用每个安全对象的正确的审核规则类型。When you work with arrays or collections that contain multiple types of security objects, use this property to determine the correct audit rule type to use with each security object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool RemoveAccessRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule rule) cil managed
Public Function RemoveAccessRule (rule As RegistryAccessRule) As Boolean

param.name: rule
param.span: 指定要搜索的用户和 的 ，以及匹配规则（如果找到）必须兼容的一组继承和传播标志。

span.span: A that specifies the user and to search for, and a set of inheritance and propagation flags that a matching rule, if found, must be compatible with.

param.span: 指定要从兼容规则移除的权限（如果找到）。

span.span: Specifies the rights to remove from the compatible rule, if found.

summary.span: 搜索如下的访问控制规则：与指定的访问规则具有相同的用户和 （允许或拒绝），并具有兼容的继承和传播标志；如果找到，则从中移除指定访问规则中包含的权限。

span.span: Searches for an access control rule with the same user and (allow or deny) as the specified access rule, and with compatible inheritance and propagation flags; if such a rule is found, the rights contained in the specified access rule are removed from it.

returns.span: 如果找到一个兼容规则，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a compatible rule is found; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前具有相同的用户以及相同的规则中搜索值作为`rule`。The current is searched for a rule that has the same user and the same value as `rule`. 如果找到任何此类规则，不执行任何操作，并且该方法返回`false`。If no such rule is found, no action is taken, and the method returns `false`. 如果找到匹配规则，将检查其继承和兼容性标志是否与中指定的标志的兼容性`rule`。If matching rules are found, their inheritance and compatibility flags are checked for compatibility with the flags specified in `rule`. 如果找到不兼容的规则，不执行任何操作，并且该方法返回`false`。If no compatible rule is found, no action is taken, and the method returns `false`. 如果找到具有兼容的标志的规则，则在指定的权限`rule`删除从兼容规则，并且该方法返回`true`。If a rule with compatible flags is found, the rights specified in `rule` are removed from the compatible rule, and the method returns `true`. 如果`rule`指定不兼容的规则中包含的权限，根据这些权限不执行任何操作。If `rule` specifies rights not contained in the compatible rule, no action is taken with respect to those rights. 如果从兼容规则移除的所有权限，整个规则都已从当前对象。If all rights are removed from the compatible rule, the entire rule is removed from the current object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何方法从兼容规则，将删除权限和如何方法将使用兼容的规则的权限合并。The following code example shows how the method removes rights from a compatible rule, and how the method merges rights with compatible rules. 此示例将创建对象并将添加一个规则： 允许当前用户权限。The example creates a object and adds a rule that allows the current user rights. 然后，示例创建一个规则，授予用户、 具有相同的继承和传播权限作为第一个规则，并使用方法中删除此新规则与对象。The example then creates a rule that grants the user , with the same inheritance and propagation rights as the first rule, and uses the method to remove this new rule from the object. 是的构成，因此它从兼容规则中删除。 is a constituent of , so it is removed from the compatible rule. 中的规则对象，分别显示剩余组成部分。The rules in the object are displayed, showing the remaining constituents of . 然后，示例代码调用方法来合并回中的规则右键对象。The example code then calls the method to merge the right back into the rule in the object. > [!NOTE] > 此示例不会附加到的安全对象对象。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 本部分中的第二个示例将附加的安全对象，也是如此示例 。The second example in this section attaches a security object, and so do the examples in . [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)]

param.name: rule
param.span: 一个 ，指定要搜索的用户和 。

span.span: A that specifies the user and to search for.

param.span: 忽略此规则指定的任何权限、继承标志或传播标志。

span.span: Any rights, inheritance flags, or propagation flags specified by this rule are ignored.

summary.span: 搜索与指定的规则具有相同用户和 （允许或拒绝）的所有访问控制规则，如果找到则将其移除。

span.span: Searches for all access control rules with the same user and (allow or deny) as the specified rule and, if found, removes them.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前具有相同的用户以及相同的规则中搜索值作为`rule`。The current is searched for rules that have the same user and the same value as `rule`. 任何权限、 继承标志或传播标志指定`rule`时执行此搜索，将忽略。Any rights, inheritance flags, or propagation flags specified by `rule` are ignored when performing this search. 如果不找到任何匹配的规则，不执行任何操作。If no matching rules are found, no action is taken. 例如，如果用户具有多个规则，允许具有不同的继承和传播标志的各种权限，则可以删除所有这些规则通过创建对象，它指定用户和、 使用任何任意权限和标志，并将传递到该规则方法。For example, if a user has multiple rules that allow various rights with different inheritance and propagation flags, you can remove all those rules by creating a object that specifies the user and , with any arbitrary rights and flags, and passing that rule to the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法中删除所有与用户匹配的规则和，忽略权限和标志。The following code example shows that the method removes all rules that match user and , ignoring rights and flags. 此示例将创建对象，并添加允许和拒绝具有不同的继承和传播标志的当前用户的各种权限的规则。The example creates a object and adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user, with different inheritance and propagation flags. 该示例然后创建新的规则，允许当前用户取得所有权，并将传递到该规则方法中删除允许访问的两个规则。The example then creates a new rule that allows the current user to take ownership, and passes that rule to the method to remove the two rules that allow access. > [!NOTE] > 此示例不会附加到的安全对象对象。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 请参阅方法和方法。See the method and the method. [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRuleAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRuleAll/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRuleAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRuleAll/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveAccessRuleSpecific(class System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 要移除的 。

span.span: The to remove.

summary.span: 搜索与指定的规则完全匹配的访问控制规则，如果找到则将其移除。

span.span: Searches for an access control rule that exactly matches the specified rule and, if found, removes it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当完全匹配时移除规则`rule`中的所有详细信息，包括标志。The rule is removed only if it exactly matches `rule` in all details, including flags. 其他规则具有相同的用户和不会受到影响。Other rules with the same user and are not affected. > [!IMPORTANT] > 一个规则表示一个或多个基础访问控制项 (ACE)，这些条目拆分或组合根据需要修改用户的访问安全性规则时。A rule represents one or more underlying access control entries (ACE), and these entries are split or combined as necessary when you modify the access security rules for a user. 因此，存在的规则可能无法再在特定窗体时添加，并在这种情况下方法不能删除它。Thus, a rule might no longer exist in the specific form it had when it was added, and in that case the method cannot remove it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法删除规则，仅当完全匹配。The following code example shows that the method removes a rule only if it matches exactly. 该示例创建两个规则，允许不同的权限。The example creates two rules that allow different rights. 规则具有兼容的继承和传播标志，因此添加第二个规则时合并的第一个。The rules have compatible inheritance and propagation flags, so when the second rule is added it merges with the first. 此示例调用方法，指定第一个规则，但由于合并规则不匹配的规则。The example calls the method, specifying the first rule, but because the rules are merged there is no rule that matches. 该示例然后调用方法删除第二个规则从合并的规则，并最后调用方法的第一个规则中删除。The example then calls the method to the remove the second rule from the merged rule, and finally calls the method to remove the first rule. > [!NOTE] > 此示例不会附加到的安全对象对象。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 请参阅方法和方法。See the method and the method. [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRuleSpecific#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRuleSpecific/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRuleSpecific#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRuleSpecific/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当完全匹配时移除规则`rule`中的所有详细信息，包括标志。The rule is removed only if it exactly matches `rule` in all details, including flags. 不会影响同一个用户的其他审核规则。Other audit rules for the same user are not affected. > [!IMPORTANT] > 一个规则表示一个或多个基础访问控制项 (ACE)，这些条目拆分或组合根据需要修改用户的审核安全规则时。A rule represents one or more underlying access control entries (ACE), and these entries are split or combined as necessary when you modify the audit security rules for a user. 因此，存在的规则可能无法再在特定窗体时添加，并在这种情况下方法不能删除它。Thus, a rule might no longer exist in the specific form it had when it was added, and in that case the method cannot remove it.

span.span: Removes all access control rules with the same user as the specified rule, regardless of , and then adds the specified rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有与指定的规则匹配的用户的访问规则`rule`添加。If there are no access rules whose user matches the specified rule, `rule` is added. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法会替换为匹配指定的规则匹配的用户的所有规则。The following code example shows how the method replaces all rules for the matching user with the rule specified for the match. 此示例将创建对象，并添加允许和拒绝具有不同的继承和传播标志的当前用户的各种权限的规则。The example creates a object and adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user, with different inheritance and propagation flags. 该示例然后创建新的规则，允许当前用户只能读取注册表项，并使用方法来删除该用户的所有规则并将它们替换为新的规则。The example then creates a new rule that allows the current user only to read the key, and uses the method to remove the all rules for the user and replace them with the new rule. > [!NOTE] > 此示例不会附加到的安全对象对象。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 请参阅方法和方法。See the method and the method. [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.ResetAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.ResetAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.ResetAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.ResetAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的规则具有，此方法的效果是删除所有为指定的用户，它们替换为指定的规则的规则。If the specified rule has , the effect of this method is to remove all rules for the specified user, replacing them with the specified rule. 如果指定的规则具有，则所有规则指定的用户将替换为指定的规则。If the specified rule has , all rules for the specified user are replaced with the specified rule. 如果没有规则的用户和匹配指定的规则`rule`添加。If there are no rules whose user and match the specified rule, `rule` is added. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法移除匹配这两个用户的所有规则和的`rule`、 忽略权限和标志，并将它们替换为`rule`。The following code example shows that the method removes all rules that match both the user and the of `rule`, ignoring rights and flags, and replaces them with `rule`. 此示例将创建对象，并添加允许和拒绝具有不同的继承和传播标志的当前用户的各种权限的规则。The example creates a object and adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user, with different inheritance and propagation flags. 该示例然后创建新的规则，允许当前用户只能读取注册表项，并使用方法来删除允许访问的两个规则，并将它们替换为新的规则。The example then creates a new rule that allows the current user only to read the key, and uses the method to remove the two rules that allow access and to replace them with the new rule. 拒绝访问的规则不受影响。The rule that denies access is not affected. > [!NOTE] > 此示例不会附加到的安全对象对象。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 请参阅方法和方法。See the method and the method.
